column4: I am no longer able to boot vista after the installation of Ubuntu. I can an all screwed up screen with signs and letters scattered all over the screen, with no decent text. Please advise.
your computer was exorsized, but seriously if you need it back whack in a windows cd
it will replace the bootloader into the mbr
there are 2 problems with that. 1. i don't have a windows cd at hand. 2. I need both the OS's.
